Benefits·       Multi-national, Friendly and Cooperative work environment ·       Market standard compensation with generous commission and bonus schemes. ·       Mostly autonomous work profile backed up by Engineering, Pre-Sales and Commercial teams. ·       Focused and highly engineered quality Product line with In-House R&D team. ·       Immense growth opportunitiesSkills
